articles.title: China Locks Down Area Around World's Largest iPhone Factory - NDTV
articles.description: Chinese authorities on Wednesday locked down the area surrounding the world's largest iPhone factory after reports of an outbreak at the facility spread on social media.
articles.content:
The area surrounds the world's largest iPhone factory run by Taiwanese tech giant Foxconn

articles.title: Parag Agrawal is out, but another Indian-origin executive is helping Elon Musk run Twitter - India Today
articles.description: Parag Agrawal and some of the top Twitter executives are out, but there’s one Indian-origin executive helping Elon Musk restructure the company. Sriram Krishnan publicly announced working with Musk.
